meanings.definition: The quality or state of being thermoplastic.
meanings.sent1: The thermoplasticity of the material allows it to be easily shaped when heated.
meanings.sent2: The artist used thermoplasticity to create a unique sculpture.
meanings.sent3: The thermoplasticity of the clay made it look like a melted ice cream cone!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity had a thermoplasticity that transformed ordinary ideas into extraordinary ones.
meanings.sent5: The thermoplasticity of the rubber made it stretch and bounce back effortlessly.

meanings.definition: The ability of a material to become pliable or moldable when heated and harden when cooled.
meanings.sent1: When heated, the thermoplasticity of the plastic allowed it to be reshaped easily.
meanings.sent2: The thermoplasticity of the wax made it perfect for sculpting.
meanings.sent3: The thermoplasticity of the chocolate turned it into a gooey mess under the sun!
meanings.sent4: His ideas had a thermoplasticity that adapted to any situation.
meanings.sent5: The thermoplasticity of the metal made it ideal for forming intricate designs.
